project.name: BuildIt
project.desc: A framework for rapidly developing high-performance DSLs with little to no compiler knowledge.

project.desc: A compiler for sparse tensor algebra expressions.

project.desc: A compiler for next generation array programming.

project.desc: Auto-vectorization research for the next generation of processors

project.desc: A language for image processing and computational photography.

project.name: The Tiramisu Compiler
